name: Steel Love: Chromebeak's Memento
description:
Controller recommended.

Up face button will make Averagmus wait in place for a set distance. I meant to make an indicator for this, but realized I forgot.

CONTROLS:

(Controller)
Left Control Stick: Movement
Left Bumper: Aim
Right Bumper: Shoot (only while Aimming)
Right Control Stick: Camera rotation (Crosshair movement on Aim)
Left Face Button: Jump
Down Face Button: Run
Right Face Button: Interact
Top Face Button: Stop/Summon Averagmus

(Keyboard and Mouse)
WASD: Movement
Right Mouse (press): Aim
Left Mouse (click): Shoot (only while Aimming)
Mouse movement: Camera rotation (Crosshair movement on Aim)
Space: Jump
Shift: Run
E: Interact
F: Stop/Summon Averagmus

A bit rushed towards the end, hopefully no game breaking bugs!
BGM:
Orbital Ring System (Tatsunoko VS Capcom) remix Willfox Piano
K.K. Parade (Aircheck) - Animal Crossing New Horizons
ZapSplat - Various Sound Effects

*NOTE: fixed some typos on text dialogues, fixed bug with middle door unlocking too fast (not a speed run strat anymore!)
06/05 updated more text, disabled aiming/shooting during dialogue and death, no additional game contents were added.
